item.name: Acid
entries: When you take the {@action Attack|XPHB} action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a vial of Acid. Target one creature or object you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw ({@dc 8} plus your Dexterity modifier and {@variantrule Competencia|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}) or take {@damage 2d6} Acid damage.

item.name: Alchemist's Fire
entries: When you take the {@action Attack|XPHB} action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a flask of Alchemist's Fire. Target one creature or object you can see within 20 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw ({@dc 8} plus your Dexterity modifier and {@variantrule Competencia|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}) or take {@damage 1d4} Fire damage and start {@hazard burning|XPHB}.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Inteligencia

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Identify a substance ({@dc 15}), or start a fire ({@dc 15})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Acid|XPHB}, {@item Alchemist's Fire|XPHB}, {@item Component Pouch|XPHB}, {@item Aceite|XPHB}, {@item Paper|XPHB}, {@item Perfume|XPHB}

item.name: Amuleto
entries: Para que un amuleto sea efectivo como símbolo sagrado debes llevarlo puesto o sostenido.

item.name: Antitoxin
entries: As a {@variantrule Acción adicional|XPHB}, you can drink a vial of Antitoxin to gain {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on saving throws to avoid or end the {@condition Envenenado|XPHB} condition for 1 hour.

item.name: Mochila
entries: Una mochila soporta hasta 30 libras (15 kg) en un volumen de 1 pie cúbico (30 l). También puede servir de alforja.

item.name: Bolas de metal
entries: Como acción de utilizar, puedes verter las bolas de metal de su bolsa. Se esparcirán para cubrir una zona cuadrada y plana de 10 pies (3 m) de lado a 3 m o menos de ti. Las criaturas que entren en esta zona por primera vez en un turno deberán superar una tirada de salvación de Destreza con CD 10 o tendrán el estado de {@condition derribado|XPHB|derribadas}. Se tarda 10 minutos en recuperar las bolas de metal.

item.name: Barrel
entries: A Barrel holds up to 40 gallons of liquid or up to 4 cubic feet of dry goods.

item.name: Veneno básico
entries: Como {@variantrule acción adicional|XPHB}, puedes usar un vial de veneno básico para impregnar un arma o hasta tres unidades de munición. Las criaturas que sufran daño cortante o perforante por el arma o munición envenenadas recibirán {@damage 1d4} de daño de veneno adicional. Una vez aplicado, el veneno mantiene su efectividad durante 1 minuto o hasta que inflija su daño, lo que ocurra primero.

item.name: Basket
entries: A Basket holds up to 40 pounds within 2 cubic feet.

item.name: Bedroll
entries: A Bedroll sleeps one Small or Medium creature. While in a Bedroll, you automatically succeed on saving throws against {@hazard extreme cold|XDMG} (see the {@book Dungeon Master's Guide|XDMG}).

item.name: Campana
entries: Al tañer una campana como acción de utilizar, producirá un sonido audible a 60 pies (18 m) de distancia.

item.name: Manta
entries: Mientras te envuelvas en una manta, tendrás ventaja en las tiradas de salvación contra el frío extremo (consulta la Guía del Dungeon Master).

item.name: Block and Tackle
entries: A {@item Block and Tackle|XPHB} allows you to hoist up to four times the weight you can normally lift.

item.name: Book
entries: A Book contains fiction or nonfiction. If you consult an accurate nonfiction Book about its topic, you gain a +5 bonus to Intelligence ({@skill Arcana|XPHB}, {@skill History|XPHB}, {@skill Nature|XPHB}, or {@skill Religion|XPHB}) checks you make about that topic.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Inteligencia

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Detect poisoned drink ({@dc 15}), or identify alcohol ({@dc 10})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Antitoxin|XPHB}

item.name: Bucket
entries: A Bucket holds up to half a cubic foot of contents.

item.name: Bullseye Lantern
entries: A Bullseye Lantern burns Oil as fuel to cast {@variantrule Luz brillante|XPHB} in a 60-foot Cone and {@variantrule Luz tenue|XPHB} for an additional 60 feet.

item.name: Paquete de ladrón
entries: Un paquete de ladrón contiene los siguientes objetos: {@item bolas de metal|XPHB}, {@item campana|XPHB}, {@item cantimplora|XPHB}, {@item cuerda|XPHB}, 7 frascos de {@item aceite|XPHB}, {@item linterna sorda|XPHB}, {@item mochila|XPHB}, {@item palanqueta|XPHB}, {@item raciones|XPHB} para 5 días, 10 {@item Vela|XPHB|velas} y {@item yesquero|XPHB}.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Destreza

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Write text with impressive flourishes that guard against forgery ({@dc 15})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Ink|XPHB}, {@item Spell Scroll|XDMG}

item.name: Abrojos
entries: Como acción de utilizar, puedes esparcir los abrojos de tu bolsa para cubrir una zona cuadrada de 5 pies (1,5 m) de lado a 1,5 m o menos de ti. Las criaturas que entren en esta zona por primera vez en un turno deberán superar una tirada de salvación de Destreza con CD 15 o sufrirán 1 de daño perforante y su velocidad se reducirá a O hasta el principio de su siguiente turno. Se tarda 10 minutos en recuperar los abrojos.

item.name: Vela
entries: Durante 1 hora, una vela encendida emite {@variantrule luz brillante|XPHB} en un radio de 5 pies (1,5 m) y {@variantrule luz tenue|XPHB} 1,5 m más allá.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Strength

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Seal or pry open a door or container ({@dc 20})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Garrote|XPHB}, {@item Garrote grande|XPHB}, {@item Bastón|XPHB}, {@item Barrel|XPHB}, {@item Chest|XPHB}, {@item Ladder|XPHB}, {@item Pole|XPHB}, {@item Portable Ram|XPHB}, {@item Antorcha|XPHB}

items.name: Característica:
entries: Wisdom

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Draft a map of a small area ({@dc 15})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Map|XPHB}

item.name: Chain
entries: As a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action, you can wrap a Chain around an unwilling creature within 5 feet of yourself that has the {@condition Agarrado|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitado|XPHB}, or {@condition Apresado|XPHB} condition if you succeed on a {@dc 13} Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check. If the creature's legs are bound, the creature has the {@condition Apresado|XPHB} condition until it escapes. Escaping the Chain requires the creature to make a successful {@dc 18} Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics|XPHB}) check as an action. Bursting the Chain requires a successful {@dc 20} Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check as an action.

item.name: Chest
entries: A Chest holds up to 12 cubic feet of contents.

item.name: Climber's Kit
entries: A Climber's Kit includes boot tips, gloves, pitons, and a harness. As a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action, you can use the Climber's Kit to anchor yourself; when you do, you can't fall more than 25 feet from the anchor point, and you can't move more than 25 feet from there without undoing the anchor as a {@variantrule Acción adicional|XPHB}.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Destreza

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Modify footwear to give {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the wearer's next Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics|XPHB}) check ({@dc 10})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Climber's Kit|XPHB}

item.name: Component Pouch
entries: A Component Pouch is watertight and filled with compartments that hold all the free Material components of your spells.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Wisdom

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Improve food's flavor ({@dc 10}), or detect spoiled or poisoned food ({@dc 15})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Raciones|XPHB}

item.name: Costume
entries: While wearing a Costume, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on any ability check you make to impersonate the person or type of person it represents.

item.name: Crossbow Bolt Case
entries: A {@item Crossbow Bolt Case|XPHB} holds up to 20 Bolts.

item.name: Palanqueta
entries: Una palanqueta te da ventaja en las pruebas de Fuerza en las que se pueda hacer palanca.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Wisdom

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Discern whether someone is cheating ({@dc 10}), or win the game ({@dc 20})

item.name: Diplomat's Pack
entries: A Diplomat's Pack contains the following items: {@item Chest|XPHB}, {@item Fine Clothes|XPHB}, {@item Ink|XPHB}, 5 {@item Ink Pen|XPHB|Ink Pens}, {@item lámpara|XPHB}, 2 {@item Map or Scroll Case|XPHB|Map or Scroll Cases}, 4 flasks of {@item Aceite|XPHB}, 5 sheets of {@item Paper|XPHB}, 5 sheets of {@item Parchment|XPHB}, {@item Perfume|XPHB}, and {@item Yesquero|XPHB}.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Charisma

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Apply makeup ({@dc 10})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Costume|XPHB}

items.name: Característica:
entries: Wisdom

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Discern whether someone is cheating ({@dc 10}), or win the game ({@dc 20})

item.name: Paquete de explorador de mazmorras
entries: Un paquete de explorador de mazmorras contiene los siguientes objetos: {@item Abrojos|XPHB}, 10 {@item Antorcha|XPHB|Antorchas}, {@item Cantimplora|XPHB}, {@item Cuerda|XPHB}, 2 frascos de {@item Aceite|XPHB}, {@item Mochila|XPHB}, {@item Palanqueta|XPHB}, {@item Raciones|XPHB} para 10 días y {@item Yesquero|XPHB}.

item.name: Emblema
entries: Para que un emblema sea efectivo como símbolo sagrado, debes mostrarlo en tela (como un tabardo o un estandarte) o en un {@item escudo|XPHB}.

item.name: Entertainer's Pack
entries: An Entertainer's Pack contains the following items: {@item Mochila|XPHB}, {@item Bedroll|XPHB}, {@item Campana|XPHB}, {@item Bullseye Lantern|XPHB}, 3 {@item Costume|XPHB|Costumes}, {@item Mirror|XPHB}, 8 flasks of {@item Aceite|XPHB}, 9 days of {@item Raciones|XPHB}, {@item Yesquero|XPHB}, and {@item Cantimplora|XPHB}.

item.name: Exotic Saddle
entries: A saddle comes with a bit, a bridle, reins, and any other equipment needed to use the saddle. An Exotic Saddle is required for riding an aquatic or a flying mount.

item.name: Explorer's Pack
entries: An Explorer's Pack contains the following items: {@item Mochila|XPHB}, {@item Bedroll|XPHB}, 2 flasks of {@item Aceite|XPHB}, 10 days of {@item Raciones|XPHB}, {@item Cuerda|XPHB}, {@item Yesquero|XPHB}, 10 {@item Antorcha|XPHB|Torches}, and {@item Cantimplora|XPHB}.

item.name: Fine Clothes
entries: Fine Clothes are made of expensive fabrics and adorned with expertly crafted details. Some events and locations admit only people wearing these clothes.

item.name: Flask
entries: A Flask holds up to 1 pint.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Destreza

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Mimic 10 or fewer words of someone else's handwriting ({@dc 15}), or duplicate a wax seal ({@dc 20})

item.name: Glass Bottle
entries: A Glass Bottle holds up to 1½ pints.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Inteligencia

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Discern what a glass object held in the past 24 hours ({@dc 15})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Glass Bottle|XPHB}, {@item Magnifying Glass|XPHB}, {@item Spyglass|XPHB}, {@item Vial|XPHB}

item.name: Grappling Hook
entries: As a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action, you can throw the Grappling Hook at a railing, a ledge, or another catch within 50 feet of yourself, and the hook catches on if you succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity ({@skill Acrobatics|XPHB}) check. If you tied a Rope to the hook, you can then climb it.

item.name: Healer's Kit
entries: A Healer's Kit has ten uses. As a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action, you can expend one of its uses to stabilize an {@condition Inconsciente|XPHB} creature that has 0 {@variantrule Hit Points|XPHB} without needing to make a Wisdom ({@skill Medicine|XPHB}) check.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Inteligencia

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Identify a plant ({@dc 10})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Antitoxin|XPHB}, {@item Vela|XPHB}, {@item Healer's Kit|XPHB}, {@item Potion of Healing|XDMG}

item.name: Agua bendita
entries: Cuando lleves a cabo la acción de atacar, puedes sustituir uno de tus ataques por lanzar un frasco de agua bendita. Haz objetivo a una criatura que puedas ver a 20 pies (6 m) o menos de ti. El objetivo deberá superar una tirada de salvación de Destreza (CD 8 más tu modificador por Destreza y tu bonificador por competencia) o sufrirá {@damage 2d8} de daño radiante si es un infernal o un muerto viviente.

item.name: Linterna sorda
entries: Una linterna sorda quema aceite como combustible para emitir {@variantrule luz brillante|XPHB} en un radio de 30 pies (9 m) y {@variantrule luz tenue|XPHB} 9 m más allá. Como acción adicional, puedes cubrir la abertura con la tapa y hacer que solo emita {@variantrule luz tenue|XPHB} en un radio de 5 pies (1,5 m), o abrirla de nuevo.

item.name: Hunting Trap
entries: As a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action, you can set a Hunting Trap, which is a sawtooth steel ring that snaps shut when a creature steps on a pressure plate in the center. The trap is affixed by a heavy chain to an immobile object, such as a tree or a spike driven into the ground. A creature that steps on the plate must succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity saving throw or take {@damage 1d4} Piercing damage and have its {@variantrule Velocidad|XPHB} reduced to 0 until the start of its next turn. Thereafter, until the creature breaks free of the trap, its movement is limited by the length of the chain (typically 3 feet). A creature can use its action to make a {@dc 13} Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check, freeing itself or another creature within its reach on a success. Each failed check deals 1 Piercing damage to the trapped creature.

item.name: Ink
entries: Ink comes in a 1-ounce bottle, which provides enough ink to write about 500 pages.

item.name: Ink Pen
entries: Using {@item Ink|XPHB}, an Ink Pen is used to write or draw.

item.name: Iron Pot
entries: An Iron Pot holds up to 1 gallon.

item.name: Iron Spike
entries: Iron Spikes come in bundles of ten. As a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action, you can use a blunt object, such as a {@item Martillo ligero|XPHB}, to hammer a spike into wood, earth, or a similar material. You can do so to jam a door shut or to then tie a {@item Cuerda|XPHB} or {@item Chain|XPHB} to the Spike.

item.name: Iron Spikes
entries: Iron Spikes come in bundles of ten. As a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action, you can use a blunt object, such as a {@item Martillo ligero|XPHB}, to hammer a spike into wood, earth, or a similar material. You can do so to jam a door shut or to then tie a {@item Cuerda|XPHB} or {@item Chain|XPHB} to the Spike.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Inteligencia

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Discern a gem's value ({@dc 15})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Arcane Focus|XPHB}, {@item símbolo sagrado|XPHB}

item.name: Jug
entries: A Jug holds up to 1 gallon.

item.name: Ladder
entries: A Ladder is 10 feet tall. You must climb to move up or down it.

item.name: Lámpara
entries: Una lámpara quema {@item aceite|XPHB} como combustible para emitir {@variantrule luz brillante|XPHB} en un radio de 15 pies (4,5 m) y {@variantrule luz tenue|XPHB} 30 pies (9 m) más allá.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Destreza

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Add a design to a leather item ({@dc 10})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Honda|XPHB}, {@item Látigo|XPHB}, {@item Armadura de pieles|XPHB}, {@item Armadura de cuero|XPHB}, {@item Armadura de cuero tachonado|XPHB}, {@item Mochila|XPHB}, {@item Crossbow Bolt Case|XPHB}, {@item Map or Scroll Case|XPHB}, {@item Parchment|XPHB}, {@item Pouch|XPHB}, {@item Aljaba|XPHB}, {@item Cantimplora|XPHB}

item.name: Lock
entries: A Lock comes with a key. Without the key, a creature can use {@item Herramientas de ladrón|XPHB} to pick this Lock with a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand|XPHB}) check.

item.name: Magnifying Glass
entries: A Magnifying Glass grants {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on any ability check made to appraise or inspect a highly detailed item. Lighting a fire with a Magnifying Glass requires light as bright as sunlight to focus, tinder to ignite, and about 5 minutes for the fire to ignite.

item.name: Manacles
entries: As a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action, you can use Manacles to bind an unwilling Small or Medium creature within 5 feet of yourself that has the {@condition Agarrado|XPHB}, {@condition Incapacitado|XPHB}, or {@condition Apresado|XPHB} condition if you succeed on a {@dc 13} Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand|XPHB}) check. While bound, a creature has {@variantrule Disadvantage|XPHB} on attack rolls, and the creature is {@condition Apresado|XPHB} if the Manacles are attached to a chain or hook that is fixed in place. Escaping the Manacles requires a successful {@dc 20} Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand|XPHB}) check as an action. Bursting them requires a successful {@dc 25} Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check as an action.

Each set of Manacles comes with a key. Without the key, a creature can use {@item Herramientas de ladrón|XPHB} to pick the Manacles' lock with a successful {@dc 15} Dexterity ({@skill Sleight of Hand|XPHB}) check.

item.name: Map
entries: If you consult an accurate Map, you gain a +5 bonus to Wisdom ({@skill Survival|XPHB}) checks you make to find your way in the place represented on it.

item.name: Map or Scroll Case
entries: A {@item Map or Scroll Case|XPHB} holds up to 10 sheets of paper or 5 sheets of parchment.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Strength

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Chisel a symbol or hole in stone ({@dc 10})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Block and Tackle|XPHB}

item.name: Military Saddle
entries: A saddle comes with a bit, a bridle, reins, and any other equipment needed to use the saddle. A Military Saddle gives {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on any ability check you make to remain mounted.

item.name: Mirror
entries: A handheld steel Mirror is useful for personal cosmetics but also for peeking around corners and reflecting light as a signal.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Wisdom

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Plot a course ({@dc 10}), or determine position by stargazing ({@dc 15})

item.name: Net
entries: When you take the {@action Attack|XPHB} action, you can replace one of your attacks with throwing a Net. Target a creature you can see within 15 feet of yourself. The target must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw ({@dc 8} plus your Dexterity modifier and {@variantrule Competencia|XPHB|Proficiency Bonus}) or have the {@condition Apresado|XPHB} condition until it escapes. The target succeeds automatically if it is Huge or larger.

To escape, the target or a creature within 5 feet of it must take an action to make a {@dc 10} Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check, freeing the {@condition Apresado|XPHB} creature on a success. Destroying the Net (AC 10; 5 HP; {@variantrule Immunity|XPHB} to Bludgeoning, Poison, and Psychic damage) also frees the target, ending the effect.

item.name: Aceite
entries: Puedes empapar de aceite a una criatura, un objeto o un espacio o utilizarlo como combustible, como se detalla a continuación.

entries.name: Empapar a una criatura o un objeto
entries: Cuando lleves a cabo la acción de atacar, puedes sustituir uno de tus ataques por lanzar un frasco de aceite. Haz objetivo a una criatura u objeto a 20 pies (6 m) o menos de ti. El objetivo deberá superar una tirada de salvación de Destreza (CD 8 más tu modificador por Destreza y tu bonificador por competencia) o quedará cubierto de aceite. Si el objetivo sufre daño de fuego antes de que el aceite se seque (tras 1 minuto), recibirá 5 de daño de fuego adicional debido a que el aceite arderá.

entries.name: Empapar un espacio
entries: Puedes llevar a cabo la acción de utilizar para verter un frasco de aceite sobre un suelo plano para cubrir una zona cuadrada de 5 pies (1,5 m) de lado a 1,5 m o menos de ti. Si se prende, el aceite arderá durante 2 asaltos desde que se prendió (o 12 segundos) hasta el final de ese turno y hará 5 de daño de fuego a cualquier criatura que entre en la zona o termine su turno en ella. Una criatura solo puede sufrir este daño una vez por turno.

entries.name: Combustible
entries: El aceite sirve de combustible para lámparas y linternas. Un frasco de aceite prendido arde durante 6 horas en una lámpara o linterna. Esa duración no tiene que ser consecutiva; puedes apagar el aceite ardiendo (como acción de utilizar) y volver a encenderlo hasta que haya ardido durante un total de 6 horas.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Wisdom

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Paint a recognizable image of something you've seen ({@dc 10})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Druidic Focus|XPHB}, {@item símbolo sagrado|XPHB}

item.name: Paper
entries: One sheet of Paper can hold about 250 handwritten words.

item.name: Parchment
entries: One sheet of Parchment can hold about 250 handwritten words.

item.name: Perfume
entries: Perfume comes in a 4-ounce vial. For 1 hour after applying Perfume to yourself, you have {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on Charisma ({@skill Persuasion|XPHB}) checks made to influence an Indifferent Humanoid within 5 feet of yourself.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Wisdom

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Discern whether someone is cheating ({@dc 10}), or win the game ({@dc 20})

items.name: Característica:
entries: Inteligencia

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: detectar un objeto envenenado (CD 10)

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item veneno básico|XPHB}

item.name: Pole
entries: A Pole is 10 feet long. You can use it to touch something up to 10 feet away. If you must make a Strength ({@skill Athletics|XPHB}) check as part of a High or {@variantrule Salto de longitud|XPHB}, you can use the Pole to vault, giving yourself {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on the check.

item.name: Portable Ram
entries: You can use a Portable Ram to break down doors. When doing so, you gain a +4 bonus to the Strength check. One other character can help you use the ram, giving you {@variantrule Advantage|XPHB} on this check.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Inteligencia

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Discern what a ceramic object held in the past 24 hours ({@dc 15})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Jug|XPHB}, {@item lámpara|XPHB}

item.name: Pouch
entries: A Pouch holds up to 6 pounds within one-fifth of a cubic foot.

item.name: Paquete de sacerdote
entries: Un paquete de sacerdote contiene los siguientes objetos:
{@item agua bendita|XPHB}, {@item lámpara|XPHB}, {@item manta|XPHB}, {@item mochila|XPHB}, {@item raciones|XPHB} para 7 días, {@item túnica|XPHB}, and {@item yesquero|XPHB}.

mastery.note: you can use this property, and it doesn't count against the number of properties you can use with Weapon Mastery

item.name: Aljaba
entries: En una aljaba caben hasta 20 {@item Flecha|XPHB|flechas}.

item.name: Raciones
entries: Las raciones se componen de alimentos propicios para viajar, como cecina, fruta deshidratada, galletas y frutos secos. Consulta “{@hazard Malnutrition|XPHB|Desnutrición}” en el glosario de reglas para saber los riesgos que implica no comer.

item.name: Relicario
entries: Para que un relicario sea un símbolo sagrado efectivo, se debe sostener.

item.name: Riding Saddle
entries: A saddle comes with a bit, a bridle, reins, and any other equipment needed to use the saddle.

item.name: Túnica
entries: Una túnica tiene un significado vocacional y ceremonial. Algunos eventos y lugares admiten solo a gente que vista una túnica con determinados colores o símbolos.

item.name: Cuerda
entries: Como acción de utilizar, puedes hacer un nudo con una cuerda si superas una prueba de Destreza ({@skill Juego de manos|XPHB}) con CD 10. Para romper la cuerda, se debe superar una prueba de Fuerza ({@skill Atletismo|XPHB}) con CD 20.

Puedes atar a una criatura no voluntaria con la cuerda solo si tiene el estado de {@condition Agarrado|XPHB}, {@condition Apresado|XPHB} o {@condition Incapacitado|XPHB}. Si la criatura tiene las piernas atadas, tendrá el estado de apresada hasta que se libere. Para liberarse de la cuerda, deberá superar una prueba de Destreza ({@skill Acrobacias|XPHB}) con CD 15 como acción.

item.name: Sack
entries: A Sack holds up to 30 pounds within 1 cubic foot.

item.name: Scholar's Pack
entries: A Scholar's Pack contains the following items: {@item Mochila|XPHB}, {@item Book|XPHB}, {@item Ink|XPHB}, {@item Ink Pen|XPHB}, {@item lámpara|XPHB}, 10 flasks of {@item Aceite|XPHB}, 10 sheets of {@item Parchment|XPHB}, and {@item Yesquero|XPHB}.

item.name: Shovel
entries: Working for 1 hour, you can use a Shovel to dig a hole that is 5 feet on each side in soil or similar material.

item.name: Signal Whistle
entries: When blown as a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action, a Signal Whistle produces a sound that can be heard up to 600 feet away.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Strength

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Pry open a door or container ({@dc 20})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: Any Melee weapon (except {@item Garrote|XPHB}, {@item Garrote grande|XPHB}, {@item Bastón|XPHB}, and {@item Látigo|XPHB}), Medium armor (except {@item Armadura de pieles|XPHB|Hide}), Heavy armor, {@item Bolas de metal|XPHB}, {@item Bucket|XPHB}, {@item Abrojos|XPHB}, {@item Chain|XPHB}, {@item Palanqueta|XPHB}, {@item Firearm Bullets (10)|XPHB|Firearm Bullets}, {@item Grappling Hook|XPHB}, {@item Iron Pot|XPHB}, {@item Iron Spikes|XPHB}, {@item Sling Bullets (20)|XPHB|Sling Bullets}

item.name: Spyglass
entries: Objects viewed through a Spyglass are magnified to twice their size.

item.name: String
entries: String is 10 feet long. You can tie a knot in it as a {@action Utilize|XPHB} action.

item.name: Tent
entries: A Tent sleeps up to two Small or Medium creatures.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Destreza

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: forzar una cerradura (CD 15) o desarmar una trampa (CD 15)

items.name: Característica:
entries: Wisdom

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Discern whether someone is cheating ({@dc 10}), or win the game ({@dc 20})

item.name: Yesquero
entries: Un yesquero es un pequeño recipiente que contiene un pedernal, un chispero y yescas (normalmente, tela seca untada en aceite) y se utiliza para encender un fuego. Se necesita una acción adicional para prender con él una antorcha, lámpara, linterna o vela (o cualquier otra cosa con combustible expuesto). Encender cualquier otro tipo de fuego lleva 1 minuto.

items.name: Característica:
entries: Destreza

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Assemble a Tiny item composed of scrap, which falls apart in 1 minute ({@dc 20})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Mosquete|XPHB}, {@item Pistola|XPHB}, {@item Campana|XPHB}, {@item Bullseye Lantern|XPHB}, {@item Flask|XPHB}, {@item Linterna sorda|XPHB}, {@item Hunting Trap|XPHB}, {@item Lock|XPHB}, {@item Manacles|XPHB}, {@item Mirror|XPHB}, {@item Shovel|XPHB}, {@item Signal Whistle|XPHB}, {@item Yesquero|XPHB}

item.name: Antorcha
entries: Una antorcha arde durante 1 hora y emite luz brillante en un radio de 20 pies (6 m) y luz tenue 20 pies (6 m) más allá. Cuando llevas a cabo la acción de atacar, puedes hacerlo con la antorcha como si fuera un arma cuerpo a cuerpo sencilla. Si acierta, el objetivo sufre 1 de daño de fuego.

item.name: Traveler's Clothes
entries: Traveler's Clothes are resilient garments designed for travel in various environments.

item.name: Trinket
entries: When you make your character, you can roll once on the Trinkets table to gain a Tiny trinket, a simple item lightly touched by mystery. The DM might also use this table. It can help stock a room in a dungeon or fill a creature's pockets.

entries.caption: Trinkets
rows: A mummified goblin hand
A crystal that faintly glows in moonlight
A gold coin minted in an unknown land
A diary written in a language you don't know
A brass ring that never tarnishes
An old chess piece made from glass
A pair of knucklebone dice, each with a skull symbol on the side that would normally show six pips
A small idol depicting a nightmarish creature that gives you unsettling dreams when you sleep near it
A lock of someone's hair
The deed for a parcel of land in a realm unknown to you
A 1-ounce block made from an unknown material
A small cloth doll skewered with needles
A tooth from an unknown beast
An enormous scale, perhaps from a dragon
A bright-green feather
An old divination card bearing your likeness
A glass orb filled with moving smoke
A 1-pound egg with a bright-red shell
A pipe that blows bubbles
A glass jar containing a bit of flesh floating in pickling fluid
A gnome-crafted music box that plays a song you dimly remember from your childhood
A wooden statuette of a smug halfling
A brass orb etched with strange runes
A multicolored stone disk
A silver icon of a raven
A bag containing forty-seven teeth, one of which is rotten
A shard of obsidian that always feels warm to the touch
A dragon's talon strung on a leather necklace
A pair of old socks
A blank book whose pages refuse to hold ink, chalk, graphite, or any other marking
A silver badge that is a five-pointed star
A knife that belonged to a relative
A glass vial filled with nail clippings
A rectangular metal device with two tiny metal cups on one end that throws sparks when wet
A white, sequined glove sized for a human
A vest with one hundred tiny pockets
A weightless stone
A sketch of a goblin
An empty glass vial that smells of perfume
A gemstone that looks like a lump of coal when examined by anyone but you
A scrap of cloth from an old banner
A rank insignia from a lost legionnaire
A silver campana without a clapper
A mechanical canary inside a lamp
A miniature chest carved to look like it has numerous feet on the bottom
A dead sprite inside a clear glass bottle
A metal can that has no opening but sounds as if it is filled with liquid, sand, spiders, or broken glass (your choice)
A glass orb filled with water, in which swims a clockwork goldfish
A silver spoon with an M engraved on the handle
A whistle made from gold-colored wood
A dead scarab beetle the size of your hand
Two toy soldiers, one missing a head
A small box filled with different-sized buttons
A candle that can't be lit
A miniature cage with no door
An old key
An indecipherable treasure map
A hilt from a broken sword
A rabbit's foot
A glass eye
A cameo of a hideous person
A silver skull the size of a coin
An alabaster mask
A cone of sticky black incense that stinks
A nightcap that gives you pleasant dreams when you wear it
A single caltrop made from bone
A gold monocle frame without the lens
A 1-inch cube, each side a different color
A crystal doorknob
A packet filled with pink dust
A fragment of a beautiful song, written as musical notes on two pieces of parchment
A silver teardrop earring containing a real teardrop
An eggshell painted with scenes of misery in disturbing detail
A fan that, when unfolded, shows a sleepy cat
A set of bone pipes
A four-leaf clover pressed inside a book discussing manners and etiquette
A sheet of parchment upon which is drawn a mechanical contraption
An ornate scabbard that fits no blade you have found
An invitation to a party where a murder happened
A bronze pentacle with an etching of a rat's head in its center
A purple handkerchief embroidered with the name of an archmage
Half a floor plan for a temple, a castle, or another structure
A bit of folded cloth that, when unfolded, turns into a stylish cap
A receipt of deposit at a bank in a far-off city
A diary with seven missing pages
An empty silver snuffbox bearing the inscription "dreams" on its lid
An iron holy symbol devoted to an unknown god
A book about a legendary hero's rise and fall, with the last chapter missing
A vial of dragon blood
An ancient arrow of elven design
A needle that never bends
An ornate brooch of dwarven design
An empty wine bottle bearing a pretty label that says, "The Wizard of Wines Winery, Red Dragon Crush, 331422-W"
A mosaic tile with a multicolored, glazed surface
A petrified mouse
A black pirate flag adorned with a dragon's skull and crossbones
A tiny mechanical crab or spider that moves about when it's not being observed
A glass jar containing lard with a label that reads, "Griffon Grease"
A wooden box with a ceramic bottom that holds a living worm with a head on each end of its body
A metal urn containing the ashes of a hero

item.name: Vial
entries: A Vial holds up to 4 ounces.

item.name: Cantimplora
entries: En una cantimplora caben hasta 2 l (medio galón) de líquido. Si no bebes suficiente agua, te arriesgas a sufrir {@hazard Dehydration|XPHB|deshidratación}

items.name: Característica:
entries: Destreza

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Mend a tear in clothing ({@dc 10}), or sew a Tiny design ({@dc 10})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Armadura acolchada|XPHB}, {@item Basket|XPHB}, {@item Bedroll|XPHB}, {@item Manta|XPHB}, {@item Fine Clothes|XPHB}, {@item Net|XPHB}, {@item Túnica|XPHB}, {@item Cuerda|XPHB}, {@item Sack|XPHB}, {@item String|XPHB}, {@item Tent|XPHB}, {@item Traveler's Clothes|XPHB}

items.name: Característica:
entries: Destreza

items.name: Utilizar:
entries: Carve a pattern in wood ({@dc 10})

items.name: Fabricar:
entries: {@item Garrote|XPHB}, {@item Garrote grande|XPHB}, {@item Bastón|XPHB}, Ranged weapons (except {@item Pistola|XPHB}, {@item Mosquete|XPHB}, and  {@item Honda|XPHB}), {@item Arcane Focus|XPHB}, {@item Flechas (20)|XPHB|Arrows}, {@item Bolts (20)|XPHB|Bolts}, {@item Druidic Focus|XPHB}, {@item Ink Pen|XPHB}, {@item Needles (50)|XPHB|Needles}
